Rulings.Tengu:
● Discarding is part of the ② effect, not a cost, and happens simultaneous to the banish.
● If “Book of Moon” is chained to the ② effect, this card is still banished.
● The ③ effect will always Summon this card to its owner’s field (even if control was changed).
● If this card would be Special Summoned while you control 5 monsters, it is instead sent to GY (no card is added to the hand).
● If you add a monster to your hand with the ③ effect, “add 1 monster” happens after       “Special Summon this card”, so cards like Torrential Tribute will have incorrect activation timing
(If no card is added, Torrential will have correct timing, and can be activated).
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing

Rulings.Base:
1. Adding 1 monster in the GY to your hand is part of the Trigger Effect that Special Summons "Drill Warrior" during your Standby Phase.
2. Discarding 1 card and removing "Drill Warrior" from play are both part of the same Ignition Effect. Discarding the card is not a cost.
3. If you control your opponent's "Drill Warrior" and remove it from play, it will be Special Summoned to its owner's side of the field during the owner's next Standby Phase and they will add a Monster Card to their hand.
4. Special Summoning "Drill Warrior" and adding 1 Monster Card to your hand do not happen at the same time. You Special Summon, then add the Monster Card to your hand. "Bottomless Trap Hole" cannot be activated.
5. You do not target the Monster Card you return to your hand.
6. Even if you halve the ATK of "Drill Warrior", you do not have to attack directly.
7. The ATK of "Drill Warrior" remains halved until "Drill Warrior" is removed from the field or flipped face-down.

PSCT.Tengu:
Drill Synchron" + 1 or more non-Tuners
① Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1:
You can halve this card’s ATK, and if you do,   this turn, it can attack directly.
② Once per turn: You can discard 1 card,  
 and if you do, banish this card.
③ If you do, during your next Standby Phase:
Special Summon this banished card, then add 1 monster from your GY to your hand.
